home.title: Welcome to SafarMood
home.description: Find the perfect place for your mood
home.tagline: Find hotels and restaurants in Morocco based on the atmosphere you're looking for

filters.mood: What mood are you looking for?

establishment.bookingDescription: Your booking for {{name}} is being processed.

descriptions.1: A traditional riad with a romantic atmosphere in the heart of the medina.
descriptions.2: Luxury hotel offering an authentic Moroccan experience with modern facilities.
descriptions.3: Traditional Moroccan restaurant in an elegant setting with garden.
descriptions.4: Restaurant with rooftop terrace offering panoramic views of the medina.
descriptions.5: Modern hotel with ocean views, ideal for business and family travel.
descriptions.6: Modern Asian restaurant offering fusion dishes and an elegant atmosphere.
descriptions.7: Traditional riad in the heart of Fes medina with authentic decoration.

moodSearch.title: Mood-based Search
moodSearch.description: Filter establishments by desired mood (romantic, family, festive, etc.)

multipleFilters.title: Multiple Filters
multipleFilters.description: Refine your search by city, establishment type, cuisine, services, and price range

detailedView.title: Detailed View
detailedView.description: View complete information about each establishment with photos and reviews

easyBooking.title: Easy Booking
easyBooking.description: Book directly from the establishment's detail page

responsiveInterface.title: Responsive Interface
responsiveInterface.description: Application adapted to all devices (computers, tablets, smartphones)

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Receive confirmations after each action (search, booking)

moodSelection.title: Mood Selection
moodSelection.description: Choose from 7 different moods (Romantic, Family, Festive, Traditional, Modern, Quiet, Luxury)

cityFilter.title: City Filtering
cityFilter.description: Select from major Moroccan cities (Casablanca, Marrakech, Rabat, Fes, Tangier, Agadir, Essaouira)

establishmentType.title: Establishment Type Choice
establishmentType.description: Filter by hotels, restaurants, or both

cuisineSelection.title: Cuisine Selection
cuisineSelection.description: For restaurants, choose from different cuisine types (Moroccan, International, Asian, etc.)

serviceFilter.title: Service Filtering
serviceFilter.description: Select desired services (pool, spa, wifi, terrace, etc.)

priceRange.title: Price Range Choice
priceRange.description: Filter according to your budget (Budget, Moderate, Premium, Luxury)

search.title: Search
search.description: Launch the search with selected criteria

viewDetails.title: View Details
viewDetails.description: Display complete information about an establishment

booking.title: Booking
booking.description: Initiate a booking for the selected establishment

auth.verifyEmail: Please check your email to verify your account

emailTemplates.title: Custom Email Templates
emailTemplates.description: SafarMood uses customized email templates for a better user experience.
emailTemplates.signupDesc: When you register, you'll receive a branded email with SafarMood's logo and colors to confirm your account.
emailTemplates.resetDesc: Password reset emails are customized with SafarMood branding for a consistent experience.
emailTemplates.followLink: Follow this link to confirm your user:
emailTemplates.spamNotice: This message has been identified as spam.
emailTemplates.receivingNotice: You're receiving this email because you signed up for an application powered by Supabase ⚡

profile.profileUpdated: Your profile has been updated successfully
profile.pleaseLogin: Please login to view your profile

favorites.noFavorites: You haven't added any favorites yet

admin.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
